name: I Am Hamster - Simulator
summary: Step into the tiny, adorable world of a hamster in Hamster Simulator VR! :hamster: Explore colorful mazes, scurry through tunnels, run on wheels, and roll around. all in fully immersive VR! Snack on treats, interact with fun toys, and experience the joys and challenges of being a tiny furball in a giant world. Get ready for an adorable adventure full of curiosity, play, and endless fun!
